Malaria.english: 1. Use antimalarial medication. 2. Keep the child hydrated. 3. Seek healthcare immediately if symptoms worsen.
Malaria.luganda: 1. Kozesa eddagala erirwana ne malaria. 2. Muwale omwana amazzi. 3. Noonya omusawo mangu bwe mbala zikula.
Malaria.swahili: 1. Tumia dawa ya malaria. 2. Mwenye mtoto maji. 3. Tafuta msaada wa kimatibabu haraka.
Malaria.runyankole: 1. Koresha edagala ry'okurwana malaria. 2. Heesa omwana amazi. 3. Ronda omushaho mangu.

Measles.english: 1. Ensure vaccination. 2. Provide vitamin A. 3. Isolate to prevent spread.
Measles.luganda: 1. Kakasa eddagala. 2. Muwale vitamin A. 3. Mwawale omwana mu kifo ekimu.
Measles.swahili: 1. Hakikisha chanjo. 2. Toa vitamini A. 3. Tenga mtoto pekee.
Measles.runyankole: 1. Kakasa obujwa. 2. Heesa vitamini A. 3. Tema omwana kumwe.

Cholera.english: 1. Use oral rehydration solution (ORS). 2. Seek emergency medical care.
Cholera.luganda: 1. Kozesa amazzi aga ORS. 2. Noonya omusawo mangu.
Cholera.swahili: 1. Tumia ORS. 2. Tafuta matibabu ya haraka.

Pneumonia.luganda: 1. Muwale eddagala erirwana ne pneumonia. 2. Muwale omwana alambee.
Pneumonia.runyankole: 1. Heesa edagala ry'okurwana pneumonia. 2. Heesa omwana okuryama.

Malnutrition.english: 1. Provide nutrient-rich foods (eggs, beans). 2. Consult a nutritionist.
Malnutrition.luganda: 1. Muwale emmere enkaluubirizza (amagi, ebijanjaalo). 2. Kubaana ne muganga w'emmere.
Malnutrition.swahili: 1. Toa chakula chenye virutubisho (mayai, maharagwe). 2. Shauriana na mtaalamu wa lishe.
Malnutrition.runyankole: 1. Heesa emmere enkuruubiriza (amagi, ebihimba). 2. Kuraana omwetezi w'emmere.

Typhoid.luganda: 1. Kozesa eddagala erirwana ne typhoid. 2. Tereka obulungi.
Typhoid.runyankole: 1. Koresha edagala ry'okurwana typhoid. 2. Tunga obwokure.

Cerebral Malaria.luganda: 1. OKUSANGA OMUSAWO MANGU - Twale omwana mu ddwaliro mangu.
Cerebral Malaria.runyankole: 1. OBUYAMBI BWA MAIRE - Tora omwana mu ddwaliro mangu.

Meningitis.luganda: 1. OKUSANGA OMUSAWO MANGU - Twale omwana mu ddwaliro.
Meningitis.runyankole: 1. OBUYAMBI BWA MAIRE - Tora omwana mu ddwaliro.

Hepatitis B.swahili: 1. Toa chakula cha ini. 2. Hakikisha chanjo.

Sepsis.luganda: 1. OKUSANGA OMUSAWO MANGU - Eddagala ery'omubiri gye liryetaagisa.
Sepsis.runyankole: 1. OBUYAMBI BWA MAIRE - Edagala ry'omubiri rikyetaagisa.

Scabies.english: 1. Apply permethrin cream. 2. Wash bedding in hot water.
Scabies.luganda: 1. Kozesa amafuta agalumba scabies. 2. Fuula ebifaananyi by'omuliro.
Scabies.swahili: 1. Paka kremi ya permethrin. 2. Osha vitanda kwa maji moto.
Scabies.runyankole: 1. Koresha amafuta ga scabies. 2. Hara ebikoresho mu maizi omuriro.

Anemia.english: 1. Provide iron supplements. 2. Increase leafy green vegetables.
Anemia.luganda: 1. Muwale eddagala ery'ekyuma. 2. Yonja emmere ennungi.
Anemia.swahili: 1. Toa vidonge vya chuma. 2. Ongeza mboga za kijani.
Anemia.runyankole: 1. Heesa edagala ry'ekyoma. 2. Heesa ebibala by'ebinyansi.

Rheumatic Fever.luganda: 1. Muwale eddagala erirwana ne rheumatic fever. 2. Kozesa eddagala erirwaza.
Rheumatic Fever.swahili: 1. Toa antibiotiki. 2. Tumia dawa za kupunguza uvimbe.
Rheumatic Fever.runyankole: 1. Heesa edagala ry'okurwana rheumatic fever. 2. Koresha edagala ry'okurwaza.

Tuberculosis.english: 1. TB antibiotic regimen. 2. Isolate the patient.
Tuberculosis.luganda: 1. Ddagala erirwana ne TB. 2. Mwawale omulwadde.
Tuberculosis.swahili: 1. Mpangilio wa antibiotiki za kifua kikuu. 2. Tenga mgonjwa pekee.
Tuberculosis.runyankole: 1. Edagala ry'okurwana TB. 2. Tema omulwara kumwe.

Rotavirus.luganda: 1. Muwale amazzi aga ORS. 2. Muwale zinc.

Kwashiorkor.swahili: 1. Chakula chenye protini nyingi. 2. Mlisho taratibu.

HIV/AIDS (Advanced).swahili: 1. Tangu na ARV. 2. Msaada wa lishe.
